transactionId.description: Request identifier for which the performance data is being sent.

qty.description: Placed or modified orders quantity. Not applied to Cancel order / modify position / close position requests.

ask.description: Current ask price for the instrument that the user sees in the order panel.

bid.description: Current bid price for the instrument that the user sees in the order panel.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the price quote user has seen on the UI. In milliseconds.

roundTripStartTime.description: Timestamp in UTC when the request round trip started. In milliseconds.
